hero.subtitle1: The ultimate platform bridging the gap between

features.title: Why Choose
features.subtitle: We've built the most comprehensive platform for student-business connections, packed with features designed to accelerate your career.

smartMatching.title: Smart Matching
smartMatching.description: AI-powered algorithm connects you with the perfect internship opportunities based on your skills and interests.

instantApplications.title: Instant Applications
instantApplications.description: Apply to multiple positions with one click. Your portfolio and credentials are always ready to go.

verifiedCompanies.title: Verified Companies
verifiedCompanies.description: All partner companies are thoroughly vetted to ensure legitimate opportunities and safe experiences.

careerGrowth.title: Career Growth

services.subtitle1: Your AI-powered guide to the future of student-business connections!
services.subtitle2: Discover how I revolutionize the way young talent meets opportunity!

internship.title: Smart Internship Matching
internship.subtitle: AI-Powered Student-Business Connection
internship.description: Revolutionary matching system that connects ambitious students with businesses seeking fresh talent. Our advanced AI analyzes skills, interests, and company culture to create perfect matches that benefit both parties.
internship.studentBenefit: Find internships that match your career goals
internship.businessBenefit: Access to pre-screened, motivated young talent

portfolio.title: Dynamic Portfolio Showcase
portfolio.subtitle: Showcase Your Potential to the World
portfolio.description: Create stunning, interactive portfolios that tell your story. Our platform helps businesses discover your unique talents through intelligent filtering and presentation that goes beyond traditional resumes.

experience.title: Experience & Growth Hub
experience.subtitle: Build Your Professional Journey Together
experience.description: A collaborative space where students share achievements and businesses recognize potential. This creates a community-driven ecosystem that celebrates growth and builds lasting professional relationships.
experience.studentBenefit: Build a professional reputation and network

howItWorks.title: How It
howItWorks.subtitle: Getting started with LynkSkill is simple. Follow these four steps to launch your career journey.

step1.title: Create Your Profile
step1.description: Sign up in seconds and build your professional profile. Add your skills, education, projects, and what you're looking for.

step2.title: Discover Opportunities
step2.description: Browse through curated internships from verified companies. Our smart matching system shows you the best fits first.

step3.title: Apply & Connect
step3.description: Apply with one click using your LynkSkill portfolio. Chat directly with employers and schedule interviews seamlessly.

step4.title: Grow Your Career
step4.description: Land your dream internship, share your experiences, and build a portfolio that opens doors to future opportunities.

stats.title: Trusted by
stats.subtitle: Join a thriving community of students and businesses building the future together.

testimonials.title: What Students
testimonials.subtitle: Don't just take our word for it. Here's what our community has to say about their experience.

t1.name: Sarah Johnson
t1.content: LynkSkill made finding my dream internship so easy! The platform is intuitive, and I love how I can showcase my projects in my portfolio.

t2.name: Michael Chen
t2.content: The one-click application feature saved me so much time. I applied to 20 internships in one day and got 5 interviews!

t3.name: Emily Rodriguez
t3.content: Being able to share my achievements and connect with other students has been incredible. LynkSkill is more than just a job board.

faq.title: Frequently Asked
faq.subtitle: Got questions? We've got answers. Here are some of the most common questions we receive.

q1.question: Is LynkSkill free for students?
q1.answer: Yes! LynkSkill is completely free for students. We believe in making career opportunities accessible to everyone.

q2.question: How do I create a portfolio?
q2.answer: Once you sign up, you'll have access to our portfolio builder. Simply add your projects, skills, and experiences using our intuitive interface.

q3.question: Are all companies verified?
q3.answer: Absolutely. We thoroughly vet every company on our platform to ensure they're legitimate and provide quality internship experiences.

q4.question: Can I apply to multiple internships?
q4.answer: Yes! You can apply to as many internships as you'd like. Our one-click application system makes it quick and easy.

q5.question: How does the matching algorithm work?
q5.answer: Our AI analyzes your skills, interests, and career goals to recommend internships that are the best fit for you.

q6.question: Can I share my achievements?
q6.answer: Yes! The Experience Hub lets you post your achievements, milestones, and experiences to inspire others and build your professional story.

footer.title: Ready to
footer.subtitle: Join thousands of students already building their future with LynkSkill

help.findQuickAnswers: Find quick answers to common questions
help.tryDifferentKeywords: Try different keywords or contact support
help.cantFindAnswer: Can't find what you're looking for? Send us a message.
help.name: Name
help.weWillGetBack: We'll get back to you within 24 hours.
help.proTipCompany: Use AI Mode to get instant answers to common questions about recruitment and candidate management!
help.proTipStudent: Use AI Mode to get instant answers to common questions about internships and applications!

companyFaq.howSetUpProfile: How do I set up my company profile?
companyFaq.howSetUpProfileAnswer: After signing up, complete the onboarding process to set up your company profile. Add your company logo, description, industry, and team members.
companyFaq.howInviteTeam: How do I invite team members?
companyFaq.howInviteTeamAnswer: Go to Settings > Team and click 'Invite Member'. Enter their email and assign a role (Admin, Recruiter, or Viewer). They'll receive an invitation email.
companyFaq.whatIsAiModeAnswer: AI Mode is our intelligent assistant that helps you find matching candidates and streamline your recruitment process. It analyzes candidate profiles to provide personalized recommendations.
companyFaq.howCreateListing: How do I create an internship listing?
companyFaq.howCreateListingAnswer: Go to Internships > Create New. Fill in the job title, description, requirements, duration, and compensation details. You can also add assignments that candidates must complete.
companyFaq.howEditClose: How do I edit or close an internship?
companyFaq.howEditCloseAnswer: Navigate to your internship listing and click 'Edit' to make changes or 'Close Applications' to stop accepting new applications.
companyFaq.canFeatureListing: Can I feature my internship listing?
companyFaq.canFeatureListingAnswer: Featured listings are coming soon! Contact support to learn about early access to premium placement options.
companyFaq.howReviewAppsAnswer: Go to Applications to see all submissions. You can filter by status, sort by date, and click on any application to view the candidate's full portfolio.
companyFaq.howContactCandidatesAnswer: Use the built-in messaging system to communicate with candidates. You can also schedule interviews directly through the platform.
companyFaq.howApproveReject: How do I approve or reject applications?
companyFaq.howApproveRejectAnswer: Open an application and use the 'Approve' or 'Reject' buttons. You can also add notes for your team and send automated notifications to candidates.
companyFaq.howUpdateCompanyInfo: How do I update company information?
companyFaq.howUpdateCompanyInfoAnswer: Go to Settings > Company Profile to update your company name, logo, description, and other details.
companyFaq.howManagePermissions: How do I manage team permissions?
companyFaq.howManagePermissionsAnswer: Navigate to Settings > Team to view and modify team member roles and permissions. Admins have full access, Recruiters can manage applications, and Viewers have read-only access.
companyFaq.howDeleteAccount: How do I delete my company account?
companyFaq.howDeleteAccountAnswer: Contact our support team to request account deletion. We'll process your request within 30 days and remove all company data.

studentFaq.howCreateProfile: How do I create my profile?
studentFaq.howCreateProfileAnswer: After signing up, you'll be guided through an onboarding process. Fill in your personal information, add your skills, and upload a profile photo. You can always edit your profile later from the Settings page.
studentFaq.howFindInternshipsAnswer: Navigate to the 'Internships' section from the sidebar. You can browse all available internships, use filters to narrow down your search, and save interesting opportunities for later.
studentFaq.whatIsAiModeAnswer: AI Mode is our intelligent assistant that helps you build your portfolio and find matching internships. It analyzes your skills and preferences to provide personalized recommendations.
studentFaq.howApply: How do I apply for an internship?
studentFaq.howApplyAnswer: Click on any internship card to view details, then click 'Apply Now'. You may need to complete your portfolio first. Some internships may have additional requirements like assignments.
studentFaq.canWithdrawAnswer: Yes, you can withdraw your application from the 'Applied' section as long as it hasn't been processed yet. Go to your applied internships and click the withdraw button.
studentFaq.howTrackStatus: How do I track my application status?
studentFaq.howTrackStatusAnswer: All your applications are visible in the 'Applied' section. You'll see status indicators showing whether your application is pending, approved, or rejected.
studentFaq.howBuildPortfolio: How do I build my portfolio?
studentFaq.howBuildPortfolioAnswer: Go to the Portfolio section and add your projects, skills, education, and work experience. Use AI Mode for an interactive way to build your portfolio through conversation.
studentFaq.whatIncludePortfolio: What should I include in my portfolio?
studentFaq.whatIncludePortfolioAnswer: Include your best projects, relevant skills, education background, and any work experience. Add descriptions, links, and media to showcase your abilities.
studentFaq.canCompaniesSeeAnswer: Yes, when you apply for internships, companies can view your portfolio. You can control visibility settings in Privacy settings.
studentFaq.howChangePassword: How do I change my password?
studentFaq.howChangePasswordAnswer: Go to Settings > Profile > Change Password. You'll need to enter your current password and then your new password twice to confirm.
studentFaq.howEnable2fa: How do I enable two-factor authentication?
studentFaq.howEnable2faAnswer: Navigate to Settings > Privacy > Two-Factor Authentication. Follow the setup wizard to add an extra layer of security to your account.
studentFaq.howDeleteAccount: How do I delete my account?
studentFaq.howDeleteAccountAnswer: Contact our support team to request account deletion. We'll process your request within 30 days and remove all your personal data.

helpPage.findQuickAnswers: Find quick answers to common questions
helpPage.tryDifferentKeywords: Try different keywords or contact support
helpPage.cantFindAnswer: Can't find what you're looking for? Send us a message.
helpPage.messageSentDesc: We'll get back to you within 24 hours.
helpPage.proTipDesc: Use AI Mode to get instant answers to common questions about recruitment and candidate management!
helpPage.faqSetupProfile: How do I set up my company profile?
helpPage.faqSetupProfileAnswer: After signing up, complete the onboarding process to set up your company profile. Add your company logo, description, industry, and team members.
helpPage.faqInviteTeam: How do I invite team members?
helpPage.faqInviteTeamAnswer: Go to Settings > Team and click 'Invite Member'. Enter their email and assign a role (Admin, Recruiter, or Viewer). They'll receive an invitation email.
helpPage.faqAiModeAnswer: AI Mode is our intelligent assistant that helps you find matching candidates and streamline your recruitment process. It analyzes candidate profiles to provide personalized recommendations.
helpPage.faqCreateInternship: How do I create an internship listing?
helpPage.faqCreateInternshipAnswer: Go to Internships > Create New. Fill in the job title, description, requirements, duration, and compensation details. You can also add assignments that candidates must complete.
helpPage.faqEditInternship: How do I edit or close an internship?
helpPage.faqEditInternshipAnswer: Navigate to your internship listing and click 'Edit' to make changes or 'Close Applications' to stop accepting new applications.
helpPage.faqFeatureInternship: Can I feature my internship listing?
helpPage.faqFeatureInternshipAnswer: Featured listings are coming soon! Contact support to learn about early access to premium placement options.
helpPage.faqReviewApplicationsAnswer: Go to Applications to see all submissions. You can filter by status, sort by date, and click on any application to view the candidate's full portfolio.
helpPage.faqContactCandidatesAnswer: Use the built-in messaging system to communicate with candidates. You can also schedule interviews directly through the platform.
helpPage.faqApproveReject: How do I approve or reject applications?
helpPage.faqApproveRejectAnswer: Open an application and use the 'Approve' or 'Reject' buttons. You can also add notes for your team and send automated notifications to candidates.
helpPage.faqUpdateCompanyInfo: How do I update company information?
helpPage.faqUpdateCompanyInfoAnswer: Go to Settings > Company Profile to update your company name, logo, description, and other details.
helpPage.faqManagePermissions: How do I manage team permissions?
helpPage.faqManagePermissionsAnswer: Navigate to Settings > Team to view and modify team member roles and permissions. Admins have full access, Recruiters can manage applications, and Viewers have read-only access.
helpPage.faqDeleteAccount: How do I delete my company account?
helpPage.faqDeleteAccountAnswer: Contact our support team to request account deletion. We'll process your request within 30 days and remove all company data.
